alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 12 at 3:28PM CDT until April 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A plume of blowing dust has been moving from southwest to northeast across the eastern part of the Hastings forecast area this afternoon with several reports of lowered visibility. Southwesterly winds ahead of a cold front will shift to the northwest over the next few hours. This will push the dust from northwest to southeast. Be prepared for rapidly changing visibility due to blowing dust. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.
